description: Simple and tasty, this roast pumpkin can be served straight from the oven or enjoyed at room temperature.
name: Roast Butternut Pumpkin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fill hollows of both pumpkin halves with mixture. Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake for a further 15 minutes or until golden and pumpkin is tender. Garnish with extra sage leaves.
